lexUnit.name: inject.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: introduce (a new or different element) into something

sentence.text: The doctor followed me almost immediately and injected my grandfather in the back of his hand .
Alan Hirst , 39 , who has a rare allergy , injected himself with adrenalin after he was stung at Bawtry , Doncaster .
Murray , he alleged , then had gone to the bothy next door where he had injected three men with heroin .
Mr Goldring claimed Allitt had injected her with insulin and said a test after her death had found a high level of the drug in her blood .
Mr Goldring claimed she had injected one baby with potassium .
Teams of scuba divers have injected thousands of them with copper .
In Dalby the victim injected herself .
He put 10ml into the syringe , closed his eyes and injected the patient .
While this generally does not matter when cells are injected , solutions may leak into tissues other than that intended for labelling .
The ministry revealed that in experiments one pig had developed spongiform encephalopathy after its brain had been injected with BSE-infected tissue from a cow brain .
Last week the Government warned that around 300 women who 'd been injected with a hormone called gonadotrophin , extracted from the pituitary glands of human corpses , could be at risk .
They have been injected with an insoluble luminous dye to help sell the fish .
Some of the males were injected with morphine for a few days and some were given other drugs .
Mungo nodded , calling to mind a diabetic schoolfriend who had to inject himself daily .
Drug abusers who inject themselves risk catching hepatitis ( a serious blood disease ) and many other infections , abscesses and even gangrene .
In rats injected intraperitoneally with bFGF , the number of capillaries almost doubled and the number of myofibroblasts was significantly increased ( by about 30% ) .

The ministry has faced criticism for permitting the sale of milk produced by cows injected with the experimental , genetically engineered drug BST as the identity of farms and dairies taking part in the experiments is kept secret .
The time mice injected with material from the trained rats take to enter the dark box is compared with that for animals injected with “ naïve ” material .

To demonstrate that learning and memory retention can be improved in animals injected with peptides and tested under highly contrived laboratory conditions is very different from showing that human memory can be helped by popping a pill .
Supermice have been grown , injected with rat growth hormone ; and similar transfer of human genes , for quick growth , to cattle , sheep and pigs became a possibility .
Two female New Zealand White rabbits were each injected with approximately 100µg of RAP74 or 300µg of RAP30 a week after preimmune serum had been bled .
Though , personally , she felt as if someone had injected her brain with a paralysing solution .
